module.name: XMLPropStorage
module.short: Contains a component that stores Form Session Properties in XML format.

descr.p: In this unit you can find an implementation of a name/value pair storage container in XML format.
This container will get the Form's Session Properties that you setup in TForm.SessionProperties and read/write them on the file you specify on TXMLPropStorage.FileName.

element.name: TXMLConfigStorage
element.short: Implements a configation storage mechanism using XML-tagged content.

descr.p: TXMLConfigStorage is a TConfigStorage descendant which implements an XML-storage mechanism for configuration or other values.
TXMLConfigStorage allows names (paths) and values to be accessed using an XPATH-like syntax.

It provides implementations of the abstract virtual methods defined in the ancestor class. It provides overridden constructors that allow the class instance to be created for a qualified file name, a TXMLConfig instance, a subset of values in a TXMLConfig instance, or a stream. Internally, it use TXMLConfig as the storage for values in the class instance.
Use the XMLConfig property to access the internal storage for class instance. Use the overridden methods to read, write, or delete the names and values in the class instance. For example:

element.name: TXMLConfigStorage.GetFullPathValue
element.short: Gets the String value stored at the specified path in the XML storage.

element.short: Deletes the value stored in the XML node at the specified path.

element.name: TXMLConfigStorage.DeleteFullPathValue.APath
element.short: Path to the XML node with the value removed in the method.

element.name: TXMLConfigStorage.Clear
element.short: Removes all XML nodes stored in the XMLConfig storage.

descr.p: Calls the Clear method in XMLConfig.

element.name: TXMLConfigStorage.Create
element.short: Constructor for the class instance.

descr.p: Create is the overridden, overloaded constructor for the class instance. The overloaded variants allow the XML content to read from various sources like a file name, a TXMLConfig instance, a scoped TXMLConfig instance, or a TStream instance.
Use WriteToDisk or SaveToStream to speciy where the XML content is stored .

element.name: TXMLConfigStorage.Create.Filename
element.short: Qualified file name where the XML content is stored.

element.name: TXMLConfigStorage.Create.LoadFromDisk
element.short: True to load existing XML content from the file, or False to create an empty storage.

element.name: TXMLConfigStorage.Create.TheXMLConfig
element.short: TXMLConfig instance where the XML paths and values are stored.

element.name: TXMLConfigStorage.Create.StartPath
element.short: Intial path for values read and written in the class instance.

element.name: TXMLConfigStorage.Create.s
element.short: Stream with the XML content loaded in the XMLConfig storage.

element.name: TXMLConfigStorage.Destroy
element.short: Destructor for the class instance.

descr.p: Destroy is the overridden destructor for the class instance. It uses the value in FreeXMLConfig to determine whether the TXMLConfig instance in XMLConfig is freed in the method. When set to True, XMLConfig is freed and set to Nil.
Destroy calls the inherited destructor prior to exiting from the method.

element.name: TXMLConfigStorage.XMLConfig
element.short: TXMLConfig with the values accessed and maintained in the class instance.

element.name: TXMLConfigStorage.FreeXMLConfig
element.short: Indicates whether the TXMLConfig instance is freed when the class is destroyed.

descr.p: FreeXMLConfig is a Boolean property which indicates if the TXMLConfig instance in XMLConfig is freed when the class instance is destroyed.

element.name: TXMLConfigStorage.WriteToDisk
element.short: Stores the values in XMLConfig to the specified file name.

element.name: TXMLConfigStorage.GetFilename

element.name: TXMLConfigStorage.GetFilename.Result
element.short: File passed as an argument to the overloaded constructor.

element.name: TXMLConfigStorage.SaveToStream
element.short: Saves the content in XMLConfig to the specified TStream instance.

element.name: TXMLConfigStorage.SaveToStream.s
element.short: TStream instance where the XML content is stored.
